title: Monster Hunter Wiki | Items
description: A full list of item combinations, and the various in-game shops.
subtitle: Items highlighted in orange are only available from vendors during certain shop specials.
head: <link type='text/css' rel='stylesheet' href='css/items.css'/><script type='text/javascript' src='js/toggle_full_details.js'></script>

items.name: Book of Combos 1
items.description: Intro text for first-time combiners. Improves your combining success rate.
items.acquire: Buy from the Peddler in Kokoto or the Combiner in Minegarde.

items.name: Book of Combos 2
items.description: Basic text. Together with 1, improves your combining success rate.

items.name: Book of Combos 3
items.description: Intermediate text. Along with 1 and 2, improves your combining success rate.

items.name: Book of Combos 4
items.description: Advanced text. Along with 1, 2, and 3, improves your combining success rate.

items.name: Book of Combos 5
items.description: Pro text. Along with 1, 2, 3 and 4, improves your combining success rate.

items.name: Alchemy Guide
items.description: With this book, you too can use alchemy. What will you create?

items.name: Potion
items.description: Restores a small amount of Health.

items.name: Mega Potion
items.description: Restores a moderate amount of Health.

items.name: Nutrients
items.description: Increases the maximum Health level slightly.

items.name: Mega Nutrients
items.description: Medicine that increases the maximum Health level by a small amount.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: Effectively removes all traces of poison in your system.

items.name: Immunizer
items.description: Medicine that enhances natural recovery ability.

items.name: Power Juice
items.description: Allows you to run without becoming fatigued for a period of time.

items.name: Mega Juice
items.description: Allows you to run without fatiguing for even longer than Power Juice.

items.name: Demondrug
items.description: Increases Attack power, bestowing the strength of Asura himself on user.

items.name: Mega Demondrug
items.description: Increases Attack power even more than Demondrug.

items.name: Power Pill
items.description: A strengthening pill that endows you with the power of a fierce god.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Increases Defense by hardening your skin to stone-like armor.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Increases Defense even more than Armorskin.

items.name: Armor Pill
items.description: A pill that temporarily makes your skin as hard as metal.

items.name: Cool Drink
items.description: A drink that bestows temporary resistance to extreme heat.

items.name: Hot Drink
items.description: A drink that bestows temporary resistance to extreme cold.

items.name: Psychoserum
items.description: Temporarily activates an ESP-like ability to sense wyverns.

items.name: Monster Fluid
items.description: Can be mixed with insect stomach juices to make an adhesive.

items.name: Monster Broth
items.description: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Effectively cures poison, and restores a slight amount of Health.

items.name: Max Potion
items.description: Restores Health to the maximum level, enabling a full recovery.

items.name: Ancient Potion
items.description: Restores Health and Stamina to maximum levels, enabling a full recovery.

items.name: Catalyst
items.description: Mixes with other materials to improve their effect. Cannot be used by itself.

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: A dangerous chemical that explodes when disturbed or heated.

items.name: Lifecrystals
items.description: Mysterious crystals long worshipped as a fount of life.

items.name: Lifepowder
items.description: Medicine created by combining Lifecrystals. Strong restorative power.

items.name: Powercharm
items.description: Amulet that raises Attack power. The holder gains the strength of a demon.

items.name: Powertalon
items.description: Amulet that raises Offense. Made from a wyvern's claw.

items.name: Armorcharm
items.description: Amulet that causes one's skin to become as hard as stone. Raises Defense.

items.name: Armortalon
items.description: Amulet that raises Defense. Made from a wyvern's claw.

items.name: Raw Meat
items.description: Meat obtained through carving up a monster. Has many uses.

items.name: Rare Steak
items.description: Meat cooked on the rare side. Gives a small boost to Stamina.

items.name: Well-Done Steak
items.description: Well-cooked meat. Gives a medium boost to Stamina.

items.name: Gourmet Steak
items.description: A gourmet steak cook to perfection. Gives a full boost to Stamina.

items.name: Burnt Meat
items.description: Meat burnt to a crisp. Boosts Stamina sometimes, but can also weaken you.

items.name: Poisoned Meat
items.description: Poisons if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

items.name: Tainted Meat
items.description: Paralyzes if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

items.name: Drugged Meat
items.description: Causes sleepiness if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

items.name: Kingmeat
items.description: Premium meat. Delicious and juicy.

items.name: Throwing Knife
items.description: A standard throwing knife. Goes straight to a target. (Supply Item)

items.name: Poison Thrw Knf
items.description: Throwing knife with a poison edge. Has a toxic effect. (Supply Item)

items.name: Sleeping Thr Knf
items.description: Throwing knife with an edge daubed with sleeping powder. (Supply Item)

items.name: Paralyze Thr Knf
items.description: Throwing knife with a paralysis toxin coated edge. (Supply Item)

items.name: Bomb Material
items.description: Basic ingredient for making hand-thrown bombs.

items.name: Paintball
items.description: Can be thrown at a monster to mark it for easy tracking.

items.name: Flash Bomb
items.description: Bomb that flashes brightly upon impact. Confuses monsters.

items.name: Sonic Bomb
items.description: Emits a powerful, high-frequency sound upon detonation.

items.name: Dung
items.description: Monster excrement.

items.name: Dung Bomb
items.description: Creates a terrible smell upon impact, which certain wyverns dislike.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.description: Creates a large cloud of smoke in the area where it lands.

items.name: Poison Smoke Bmb
items.description: Smoke bomb containing a toxic chemical. Popular as a household bug bomb.

items.name: Farcaster
items.description: Instantly transports you back to base camp.

items.name: Spiderweb
items.description: A spider's web. Very sticky.

items.name: Net
items.description: Powerful net able to withstand a certain amount of weight.

items.name: Pitfall Trap
items.description: Trap for catching certain wyverns. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

items.name: Trap Tool
items.description: A tool needed to place a Pitfall Trap.

items.name: Barrel Lid
items.description: A small barrel lid. There appears to be a drawing on it.

items.name: Small Barrel
items.description: A small, empty barrel.

items.name: Large Barrel
items.description: A large, empty barrel.

items.name: Sm Barrel-Bomb
items.description: A small time-bomb.

items.name: Sm Barrel-Bomb+
items.description: Upgraded Small Barrel Bomb. Not to be taken lightly despite its size.

items.name: Lg Barrel-Bomb
items.description: Powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

items.name: Lg Barrel-Bomb+
items.description: Upgraded Large Barrel Bomb. Effective against wyverns.

items.name: Huskberry
items.description: An empty berry with nothing inside.

items.name: Sm Bone Husk
items.description: Bone ammunition casing. Stronger than a Huskberry ammunition casing.

items.name: Lg Bone Husk
items.description: Bone ammunition casing that can withstand powerful explosions.

items.name: Normal S Lv1
items.description: Inexpensive ammo for novices, but don't expect much. Unlimited shots.

items.name: Normal S Lv2
items.description: Normal ammo that is more powerful than Normal S Lv1. Maximum of 99 shots.

items.name: Normal S Lv3
items.description: Normal ammo that causes more damage than its predecessor. Max 99 shots.

items.name: Pierce S Lv1
items.description: Piercing round that causes multiple hits to monsters. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Pierce S Lv2
items.description: Piercing round that causes more hits than Lv1 ammo. Max 50 shots.

items.name: Pierce S Lv3
items.description: Piercing round that causes the most hits in the class. Max 40 shots.

items.name: Pellet S Lv1
items.description: Sprays a wide area and can cause multiple hits at close range. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Pellet S Lv2
items.description: Sprays a wide area, causing more hits than Lv1 ammo. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Pellet S Lv3
items.description: Sprays a wide area, causing the most hits in the class. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Crag S Lv1
items.description: Penetrates and explodes in its target. Quite powerful. Max 9 shots.

items.name: Crag S Lv2
items.description: Very powerful shot that penetrates and explodes in its target. Max 9 shots.

items.name: Crag S Lv3
items.description: Tremendously powerful shot that penetrates and explodes. Max 9 shots.

items.name: Clust S Lv1
items.description: Splits into 3 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

items.name: Clust S Lv2
items.description: Splits into 4 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

items.name: Clust S Lv3
items.description: Splits into 5 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

items.name: Flaming S
items.description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to fire. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Water S
items.description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to water. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Thunder S
items.description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to thunder. Max 60 shots.

items.name: Dragon S
items.description: Mysterious ammo that can't be used in normal Bowguns. Maximum of 20 shots.

items.name: Dung S
items.description: Foul-smelling ammo disliked by some wyverns. Single shot, max 10 shots.

items.name: Disk S
items.description: Disk-shaped ammo that can ricochet. 3-shot burst, max 12 shots.

items.name: Recov S Lv1
items.description: Restores a small amount of Health to the target. Maximum of 12 shots.

items.name: Recov S Lv2
items.description: Restores a moderate amount of Health to the target. Maximum of 12 shots.

items.name: Poison S Lv1
items.description: Poisons target, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

items.name: Poison S Lv2
items.description: Uses a stronger poison, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

items.name: Stun S Lv1
items.description: Paralyzes target, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

items.name: Stun S Lv2
items.description: Stronger paralysis effect, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

items.name: Sleep S Lv1
items.description: Puts target to sleep, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

items.name: Sleep S Lv2
items.description: Stronger sleep effect, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

items.name: Tranq S
items.description: Tranquilizer for wyverns. Use on trapped monsters. Max 8 shots. (Supply Item)

items.name: Paint S
items.description: Marks a monster's position on the map for a set time period. Max 99 shots.

items.name: Demon S
items.description: Said to bestow the strength of Asura on the target. Max 5 shots.

items.name: Armor S
items.description: Said to make target's skin as hard as stone. Maximum of 5 shots.

items.name: Antidote S
items.description: Cures the target of any poison effect. 3-shot burst, max 99 shots.

items.name: Cricket
items.description: Energetic insect that works well as bait for fishing.

items.name: Worm
items.description: A fat nightcrawler that works well as bait for fishing.

items.name: Firefly
items.description: A firefly that's always glowing. Works well as bait for fishing.

items.name: Frog
items.description: A frog. Works well as bait for fishing.

items.name: Tuna Bait
items.description: The bait preferred by the tuna family of fish.

items.name: Arrowana Bait
items.description: The bait preferred by the arrowana family of fish.

items.name: Goldenfish Bait
items.description: The bait preferred by Goldenfish.

items.name: Mega Fishing Fly
items.description: A fly lure that causes a feeding frenzy, no matter what fish is biting.

items.name: Old Pickaxe
items.description: A cheap pickaxe with an easily chipped blade.

items.name: Iron Pickaxe
items.description: An iron pickaxe with a strong blade.

items.name: Mega Pickaxe
items.description: A steel-reinforced pickaxe that is hard to chip.

items.name: Old Bugnet
items.description: Cheap and easily torn net for catching bugs.

items.name: Bugnet
items.description: Strong net for catching bugs.

items.name: Mega Bugnet
items.description: Extremely durable net for catching bugs.

items.name: BBQ Spit
items.description: A must-have item for any hunter. Allows for the cooking of meat.

items.name: Gourmet BBQ Spit
items.description: A gourmet BBQ spit that allows you to make Well-Done Steaks more easily.

items.name: Whetstone
items.description: A standard whetstone. By grinding weapons with it Sharpness is restored.

items.name: Binoculars
items.description: Lets you observe from a distance.

items.name: Garbage
items.description: Junk created when a combination attempt fails.

items.name: Flute
items.description: A dangerous device used to attract certain monsters. May break when used.

items.name: Health Flute
items.description: Restores the Health of those who hear it. May break when used.

items.name: Antidote Flute
items.description: Eliminates poison in the blood of those who hear it. May break when used.

items.name: Demon Flute
items.description: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used.

items.name: Armor Flute
items.description: Improves the endurance of those who hear it. May break when used.

items.name: Honey
items.description: Normal honey. Highly nutritious.

items.name: Herb
items.description: A plant that restores a slight amount of Health.

items.name: Antidote Herb
items.description: A plant that has antidotal qualities. May work even if taken by itself.

items.name: Fire Herb
items.description: A plant that has flammable properties.

items.name: Ivy
items.description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant.

items.name: Sleep Herb
items.description: A plant that possesses sleep-inducing qualities.

items.name: Sap Plant
items.description: A plant with leaves coated in sticky sap. Difficult to remove once attached.

items.name: Felvine
items.description: A Melynx favorite. They can't resist its charm.

items.name: Cactus Flower
items.description: Contains antidotal substances, but has no effect by itself.

items.name: King Cactus
items.description: King of the cacti. Touch it at your own risk.

items.name: Hot Pepper
items.description: Ignites a fire after only a single bite. Warms you up, but too hot to handle.

items.name: Special Mushroom
items.description: Tiny and difficult to pick. A Mosswine's favorite food. (Account Item)

items.name: Blue Mushroom
items.description: Rare mushroom with a power-enhancing effect.

items.name: Nitroshroom
items.description: Rare mushroom with the power to generate heat.

items.name: Stunshroom
items.description: Mushroom that induces a paralytic effect.

items.name: Toadstool
items.description: A poisonous fungus. But perhaps it has other effects as well...

items.name: Dragon Toadstool
items.description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Beware.

items.name: Spicy Mushroom
items.description: A mushroom that recovers a small amount of Stamina. (Account Item)

items.name: Paintberry
items.description: Releases a paint-like juice and a powerful smell when broken.

items.name: Power Seed
items.description: Improves natural energy- flow and temporarily raises Attack power.

items.name: Armor Seed
items.description: Temporarily increases Defense when consumed. Very invigorating.

items.name: Dragon Seed
items.description: Mysterious berry said to be hated by dragons.

items.name: Scatternut
items.description: A nut that shatters to pieces when subjected to an impact.

items.name: Needleberry
items.description: A berry covered in needle-like thorns.

items.name: Bomberry
items.description: A berry that explodes when subjected to an impact.

items.name: Stone
items.description: A small rock. Can be thrown.

items.name: Disk Stone
items.description: A disk-shaped stone.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Iron Ore can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

items.name: Earth Crystal
items.description: Crystallized remains of micro biotic organisms. A prized weapon abrasive.

items.name: Machalite Ore
items.description: Better than Iron Ore. Used to make Machalite. Also called Sparrowstone.

items.name: Dragonite Ore
items.description: Better than Machalite. Extremely valuable. Also called Dragonstone.

items.name: Carbalite Ore
items.description: An experimental ore also called Spiritstone, it is superior to Dragonite.

items.name: Great Stone
items.description: Appears plain at first, but the stone's presence is easily felt.

items.name: Union Ore
items.description: Ore containing a metal that can fuse any other material together.

items.name: Firestone
items.description: Combusts at room temp. Can only be mixed with suitable materials.

items.name: Firecell Stone
items.description: A magma-like ore. Only to be handled by trained hands. AKA Eagle's Eye.

items.name: Coal
items.description: A combustible rock that emanates a faint warmth. (Account Item)

items.name: Lightcrystal
items.description: Crystal with a dull glow. Extremely hard, it is used for tools in the armory.

items.name: Novacrystal
items.description: Brightly glowing crystal. Extremely hard, it is used for tools in the armory.

items.name: Pure Crystal
items.description: 100% Pure. Due to its hardness, it is often used in workshops and armories.

items.name: Antiseptic Stone
items.description: An unnatural Crystal with enhanced antiseptic qualities.

items.name: Ice Crystal
items.description: Will not thaw at room temperature. This crystal is quite pleasant.

items.name: Knife Mackerel
items.description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to be used to sharpen weapons.

items.name: Sushifish
items.description: A delicious fish that restores a small amount of Health when consumed.

items.name: Sleepyfish
items.description: A fish with sleep-inducing properties.

items.name: Pin Tuna
items.description: A fish with a jaw covered in tiny needle-like spikes.

items.name: Rumblefish
items.description: A fish that cracks open when killed.

items.name: Scatterfish
items.description: A fish that shatters to pieces when killed.

items.name: Burst Arrowana
items.description: A fish that ruptures open when killed.

items.name: Bomb Arrowana
items.description: A fish that explodes when killed.

items.name: Goldenfish
items.description: A rare fish whose entire body is gold. Can be sold for profit. (Account Item)

items.name: Speartuna
items.description: A rare and valuable giant-sized fish. What could it be used for...?

items.name: Insect Husk
items.description: The remains of a dead insect.

items.name: Yambug
items.description: Yam-like bug that exudes a scent that drives tuna wild. Great fishing lure.

items.name: Bughopper
items.description: An insect that exudes a scent that drives arrowana wild. Great fishing lure.

items.name: Snakebee Larva
items.description: A snake-like larva with a scent that Goldenfish just love. Great fishing lure.

items.name: Godbug
items.description: An insect said to live for a thousand years.

items.name: Bitterbug
items.description: Contains a bitter essence. Has a 50% chance of curing poison if consumed.

items.name: Flashbug
items.description: An insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies.

items.name: Thunderbug
items.description: An insect that emits electricity when struck. Has many applications.

items.name: King Scarab
items.description: The royal class of the scarabs, with a hard shell and lustrous wings.

items.name: Joiner Grasshppr
items.description: A grasshopper capable of joining any two materials by excreting a firm glue.

items.name: Screamer
items.description: A monster's internal organ. If broken, it emits a shrill sound.

items.name: Poison Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ. Contains a lethal poison.

items.name: Toxin Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ filled with potent toxin. Dangerous, even to touch.

items.name: Stun Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ filled with a paralyzing neurotoxin.

items.name: Paralysis Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ filled with a powerful, paralyzing neurotoxin.

items.name: Sleep Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ filled with a powder that causes sleep when inhaled.

items.name: Coma Sac
items.description: An internal organ filled with a powder that induces coma when inhaled.

items.name: Flame Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ. Contains a very flammable powder.

items.name: Inferno Sac
items.description: A monster's internal organ filled with a powder that ignites when touched.

items.name: Electro Sac
items.description: The internal organ of a Khezu. Releases electricity if disturbed.

items.name: Thunder Sac
items.description: The internal organ of a Khezu. Contains unequaled electrical energy.

items.name: Power Extract
items.description: Gypceros extract. The secret to its ability to run fast and far.

items.name: Pale Extract
items.description: Khezu extract. Has the ability to amplify the effects of medicines.

items.name: Sm Monster Bone
items.description: A very useful material, indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

items.name: Med Monster Bone
items.description: These have more uses than smaller bones. Usually carved to make an item.

items.name: Lg Monster Bone
items.description: Indispensable for crafting one-piece items. Bone can be connected to shell.

items.name: Monster Bone+
items.description: A monster's most unique bone. Priceless strength, but difficult to work.

items.name: Mystery Bone
items.description: A well-worn bone. Not sturdy enough to use in combination.

items.name: Unknown Skull
items.description: Animal skull. So worn and weathered, it's unidentifiable.

items.name: Master's Skull
items.description: The remains of a top hunter who once let his guard down.

items.name: Bone
items.description: Just a bone. So worn and weathered, it's unidentifiable.

items.name: Wyvern Fang
items.description: Used for Bowgun munitions. Combined with explosives, it makes spreading shots.

items.name: Wyvern Claw
items.description: Used for Bowgun munitions. Combined with explosives, it makes explosive shots.

items.name: Mosswine Hide
items.description: Mosswine hide. It's covered in moss.

items.name: Mosswine Head
items.description: The head of a Mosswine. Only a true collector would bring one back.

items.name: Bullfango Pelt
items.description: Bullfango hide. It's covered in bristly fur.

items.name: Bullfango Head
items.description: A Bullfango head with a pair of huge fangs.

items.name: Kelbi Horn
items.description: Infusions of powdered Kelbi Horn are used as medicine here.

items.name: Kelbi Hide
items.description: Used to join the plates in a suit of armor and to make winter clothing.

items.name: Velociprey Fang
items.description: Sharp (though not as sharp as a wyvern fang). Used to make Bowgun ammo.

items.name: Velociprey Scale
items.description: Scale obtained by carving up a Velociprey. Blue and black in color.

items.name: Velociprey Scle+
items.description: Scale stripped from a Velociprey. It can be made into light, durable armor.

items.name: Velociprey Hide
items.description: Obtained by carving up a Velociprey. Valued as a fusing item in armorcraft.

items.name: Velociprey Hide+
items.description: The high quality, descaled hide of a Velociprey, it has many applications.

items.name: Velocidrome Claw
items.description: Claw from an alpha Velociprey. Sharp and blade-like.

items.name: Velocidrome Head
items.description: Large head with a crest. You'd look pretty fierce if you wore it on your head.

items.name: WhtVelopry Scale
items.description: Rare, White Velociprey scale. Its refined hue is a popular secret.

items.name: Wht Velopry Hide
items.description: Rare, White Velociprey hide. The elegant color is quite popular.

items.name: Genprey Fang
items.description: Poisonous fang from a Genprey. The neurotoxin even works on wyverns.

items.name: Genprey Scale
items.description: Scale from a Genprey. Acts as camouflage in the desert zones.

items.name: Genprey Scale+
items.description: Scale taken from a Genprey. Strong enough to repel a wyvern's fangs.

items.name: Genprey Hide
items.description: A hide with all the scales removed. Can be tanned at the fort.

items.name: Genprey Hide+
items.description: The high quality, descaled hide of a Genprey, it can neutralize neurotoxins.

items.name: Gendrome Hide
items.description: Sturdy green hide from a Gendrome. Perfect for making strong armor.

items.name: Ioprey Fang
items.description: Fang filled with deadly poison. Care is required when handling it.

items.name: Ioprey Scale
items.description: The dangerous poison normally in the scale has been removed.

items.name: Ioprey Scale+
items.description: Scale stripped from an Ioprey. Can be used, once the poison is removed.

items.name: Ioprey Hide
items.description: Can be tanned at the fort. The red portions are used as decorations.

items.name: Ioprey Hide+
items.description: High quality, descaled hide of an Ioprey, the red skin resists poison.

items.name: Iodrome Hide
items.description: Sturdy red hide from an Iodrome. Perfect for making strong armor.

items.name: Kut-Ku Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Yian Kut-Ku.

items.name: Kut-Ku Scale
items.description: Pink colored scale from a Kut-Ku. Fire-resistant. Can be found in the field.

items.name: Kut-Ku Shell
items.description: The Fire resistant shell of a Kut-Ku. Quite resistant to Fire.

items.name: Kut-Ku Carapace
items.description: Harder than Kut-Ku Shell, this material is also known as Gravite.

items.name: Kut-Ku Ear
items.description: The Fire resistant ear of a Kut-Ku. Used to prevent Bowgun flash-back.

items.name: Long Kut-Ku Ear
items.description: Kut-Ku's Fire resistant ear. The flexible material is a good base for armor.

items.name: Small Beak
items.description: A pleasantly small and handy beak. Begging to be held.

items.name: Giant Beak
items.description: The huge, sturdy beak of a Yian Kut-Ku.

items.name: Splendid Beak
items.description: Encountering a large, beautiful beak like this is quite rare. Splendid!

items.name: Kut-Ku Webbing
items.description: Webbing from a Kut-Ku wing. Better as a fusing material than animal skin.

items.name: Kut-Ku Wing
items.description: The wing of Yian Kut-Ku. The wing membrane is desired for its toughness.

items.name: BluKutKuCarapace
items.description: Carapace of a rare Blue Kut-Ku. The vivid blue makes it a popular item.

items.name: Blue Kut-Ku Ear
items.description: The ear of a rare Blue Kut-Ku. The shining hue is popular as ornamentation.

items.name: Blue Kut-Ku Wing
items.description: The wing of a rare Blue Kut-Ku. Often combined with a Blue Kut-Ku shell.

items.name: Gypceros Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Gypceros.

items.name: Rubbery Hide
items.description: Highly elastic Gypceros hide. A good insulator, resistant to electricity.

items.name: Rubbery Hide+
items.description: High quality, highly elastic Gypceros hide. Gives off a strange scent.

items.name: Gypceros Head
items.description: The uniquely shaped head of a Gypceros. A must have for Gypceros lovers!

items.name: Pur Rubbery Hide
items.description: A rarely seen Purple Gypceros hide. The chic purple hide is en vogue.

items.name: Piscine Fang
items.description: Fang from a Plesioth or Cephalos. Used to hold and kill prey.

items.name: Piscine Liver
items.description: Internal organ from a Piscine Wyvern. A great cure-all. (Account Item)

items.name: Piscine Jaw
items.description: The jaw of a Piscine Wyvern. Used for making powerful Great Swords.

items.name: Plesioth Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Plesioth.

items.name: Plesioth Scale
items.description: An incandescent scale from a Plesioth. Becomes brittle if it dries out.

items.name: Plesioth Scale+
items.description: An incandescent scale from a Plesioth. Becomes brittle if it dries out.

items.name: Plesioth Fin
items.description: A beautiful fin from a Plesioth. The spikes are deadly poisonous.

items.name: Plesioth Top Fin
items.description: A beautiful fin from a Plesioth. The spikes are deadly poisonous.

items.name: Grn Plesioth Scl
items.description: Scale of a mysterious Green Plesioth. It has a emerald-like glow.

items.name: Grn Plesioth Fin
items.description: A beautiful fin from a Green Plesioth. Often used in decoration.

items.name: Cephalos Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Cephalos.

items.name: Cephalos Scale
items.description: A sand wyvern scale. Its color is a brilliant blue. Retains moisture.

items.name: Cephalos Scale+
items.description: High quality sand wyvern scale. Its color is a stunning blue.

items.name: Cephalos Fin
items.description: A sand wyvern fin. It isn't poisonous, but it's very sharp.

items.name: Cephalos Fin+
items.description: A sand wyvern fin. Always being sanded to a sharp point, it can cut a rock.

items.name: Coral Cphlos Scl
items.description: A coral sand wyvern scale. The vivid purple is popular with hunters.

items.name: Coral Cphlos Fin
items.description: A pink sand wyvern fin. The faint pink color is quite cute.

items.name: Rathian Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Rathian.

items.name: Rathian Claw
items.description: Rathian wing claw, that occasionally comes off during a fight.

items.name: Rathian Scale
items.description: A scale from a Rathian, the female version of the Rathalos.

items.name: Rathian Scale+
items.description: The scale of a Rathian. It appears to be normal, but its stiffness is not.

items.name: Rathian Plate
items.description: A fiery scale from the tail of a Rathian.

items.name: Rathian Ruby
items.description: A rare, precious gem from inside a wyvern. Almost too nice to use.

items.name: Rathian Shell
items.description: Shell from a Rathian, comprised of numerous scales. Very hard.

items.name: Rathian Carapace
items.description: Harder than a Rathian Shell, this material is also known as Gravite.

items.name: Rathian Spike
items.description: Spike-like hairs from the back and wings of a Rathian. Poisonous.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Claw
items.description: Wing claw from a Pink Rathian. When torn off, it flutters like flowers.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Scl
items.description: Scale from a Pink Rathian, that resembles a dream-like flower petal.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Scl+
items.description: Scale from a Pink Rathian. The color masks its true strength.

items.name: Pnk Rthian Plate
items.description: The plate from a Pink Rathian tail. The color is enchanting.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Rby
items.description: A faintly pink, crimson colored gem. It is enthralling to view.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Shl
items.description: Shell from a Pink Rathian. It hardened during adolescence.

items.name: Pnk Rathian Cpc
items.description: Harder than Pink Rathian Shell. Its beautiful color is often used in armor.

items.name: Pnk Rthian Thorn
items.description: Poisoned, needle-like hair of a Pink Rathian. Pretty things all have thorns.

items.name: Gld Rathian Clw
items.description: Legendary wing claw from a Gold Rathian. Eye catching if torn off.

items.name: Gld Rathian Scl
items.description: Legendary scale from a Gold Rathian. Lights up even the darkest night.

items.name: Gld Rthian Plate
items.description: Plate from a Gold Rathian tail. Incredibly radiant.

items.name: Gld Rathian Rby
items.description: Captivating stone burning with radiance. A once in a lifetime item.

items.name: Gld Rathian Shl
items.description: When the golden scales are gathered to form a shell, it resembles a golden bar.

items.name: Gld Rthian Thorn
items.description: A gold hair from the back wing of a Gold Rathian. How can beauty be toxic?

items.name: Rathalos Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Rathalos.

items.name: Rathalos Claw
items.description: A Rathalos wing claw. Occasionally comes off during a fight.

items.name: Rathalos Scale
items.description: A scale from a Rathalos. These are a highly prized crafting material.

items.name: Rathalos Scale+
items.description: A scale from a Rathalos, it is extraordinarily strong.

items.name: Rathalos Plate
items.description: A fiery scale from the tail of a Rathalos.

items.name: Rathalos Ruby
items.description: A precious gem from inside a wyvern. Sending it to be processed is excruciating.

items.name: Rathalos Shell
items.description: Shell from a Rathalos, comprised of numerous scales. Very hard.

items.name: Rathalos Carapace
items.description: Harder than a Rathalos shell, this material is also known as Gravite.

items.name: Wyvern Marrow
items.description: A material obtained via new carving techniques. Highly combustible.

items.name: Rathalos Tail
items.description: The tail of a Rathalos. A multi-purpose item.

items.name: Rathalos Webbing
items.description: This heat-resistant material is often used as armor lining.

items.name: Rathalos Wing
items.description: A valuable item. Used by smiths at the armory to make Great Swords.

items.name: Azure Rthlos Clw
items.description: Wing claw from an Azure Rathalos. If torn off, it floats like a firefly.

items.name: Azure Rthlos Scl
items.description: The scale of an Azure Rathalos. It is the deep blue of the night sky.

items.name: Azre Rthlos Scl+
items.description: Scale of an Azure Rathalos. Its strength is higher than its beauty.

items.name: Azre Rthls Plate
items.description: Plate from the tail of an Azure Rathalos. More blue than the deepest sea.

items.name: Azure Rthlos Rby
items.description: A rare gem from inside a wyvern. The interior is a battle between blue & red.

items.name: Azure Rthlos Shl
items.description: The shell of an Azure Rathalos. Made of scales hardened at adolescence.

items.name: Azure Rthlos Cpc
items.description: Harder than an Azure Rathalos Shell. Its beauty is desirable for armor.

items.name: Rthlos BrainStem
items.description: The latest material to be removed with technology. Difficult to process.

items.name: Azur Rthlos Tail
items.description: The severed tail of an Azure Rathalos. Valuable for its many uses.

items.name: Azr Rthls Webbng
items.description: Webbing of an Azure Rathalos. Very valuable as a workshop material.

items.name: Azur Rthlos Wing
items.description: Wing shed by an Azure Rathalos. Used to make both weapons and armor.

items.name: Slvr Rthalos Clw
items.description: The wing claw of a Silver Rathalos. If torn off it falls like powdered snow.

items.name: Slvr Rthalos Scl
items.description: The legendary scale of a Silver Rathalos. Shines like a summer moon.

items.name: Slvr Rthls Plate
items.description: Plate from the tail of a Silver Rathalos. Explodes with an array of colors.

items.name: Slvr Rthalos Rby
items.description: A rare, precious gem from inside a wyvern. Shines like stars in the heavens.

items.name: Slvr Rthalos Shl
items.description: The hardened scales of a Silver Rathalos. Gives off a cool light. Stylish!

items.name: Slvr Rthals Tail
items.description: The severed tail of a Silver Rathalos. Valuable for its many uses.

items.name: Slv Rthls Webbng
items.description: Webbing of a Silver Rathalos. Very valuable as a workshop material.

items.name: Slvr Rthlos Wing
items.description: Wing shed by a Silver Rathalos. Hunters long for its shining glory.

items.name: Khezu Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Khezu.

items.name: Flabby Hide
items.description: Workable as a material after recent advances. Has mysterious properties.

items.name: Khezu Hide - Tan
items.description: The tanned hide of a Khezu. Its strange properties are a mystery.

items.name: Pale Bone
items.description: Rib bone from a Khezu with meat still attached.

items.name: Pale Khezu Steak
items.description: Fatty red meat from a Pale Khezu. Looks tasty, but cannot be eaten.

items.name: Pale Lips
items.description: The lips of a Khezu. Able to generate powerful suction.

items.name: Alluring Hide
items.description: Khezu hide polished to a luster. Just looking at it makes you feel strange.

items.name: Basarios Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Basarios.

items.name: Basarios Shell
items.description: Shell from a Basarios. Rock-like consistency. Can be forged into metal.

items.name: Basrios Carapace
items.description: Harder than a Basarios shell, this material is also known as Gravite.

items.name: Basarios Wing
items.description: The wing of a Basarios. Very hard to work as a material.

items.name: Basarios Tears
items.description: Faintly pink gems found near the tear ducts of a Basarios.

items.name: Gravios Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Gravios.

items.name: Gravios Shell
items.description: The stone-like shell of a Gravios. May contain traces of ore.

items.name: Gravios Carapace
items.description: Harder than Gravios Shell, this material is known as Gravite around here.

items.name: GraviosHeavyShl
items.description: Even harder than a Gravios Carapace, this material is known as Mymaite.

items.name: Gravios Wing
items.description: The wing of a Gravios. Very hard to work as a material.

items.name: StrngGraviosWing
items.description: Strongest part of a Gravios wing. Difficult to use, even for the skilled.

items.name: Gravios Head
items.description: The mask-like faceplate of a Gravios. Very hard to work as a material.

items.name: Gravios Jaw
items.description: The pronounced jaw of a Gravios. Its hardness is a hindrance to craftsmen.

items.name: Blk Gravios Shl
items.description: The shell of the rare Black Gravios. The pitch black color is appealing.

items.name: Blk Gravios Cpc
items.description: Carapace of a Black Gravios. A charred color, it is difficult to use.

items.name: Blk Gravios Head
items.description: The armored face of a Black Gravios, like a black mask. Desirable.

items.name: Blk Gravios Wing
items.description: The wing of a Black Gravios. Amazingly hard, for a wing.

items.name: Twisted Horn
items.description: The large, gnarled horn of a Diablos. Has a variety of uses.

items.name: Majestic Horn
items.description: High-quality horn from a Diablos. Used to make strong weapons.

items.name: Solid Blos Horn
items.description: The solid horn of a Diablos. Highly desirable, but hard to maintain.

items.name: Diablos Shell
items.description: Part of the shell that covers a Diablos. Very dense and heavy.

items.name: Diablos Carapace
items.description: Harder than a Diablos shell, it is also known as Gravite.

items.name: Diablos Spine
items.description: Part of the hard spine from a Diablos' back. A weaponcraft material.

items.name: Diablos Thoracic
items.description: The hardest part of a Diablos spine. Incredibly hard to carve away.

items.name: Diablos Tail
items.description: A Diablos tail. Stronger and more durable than an iron hammer.

items.name: Blos Jaw
items.description: Jawbone from a Diablos or Monoblos. Used for making powerful Great Swords.

items.name: Blos Fang
items.description: A large, sturdy fang from a Diablos or Monoblos. Stays sharp.

items.name: TwstBlkBlosHrn
items.description: Rumored to be the twisted horn of a Black Diablos. A stunning item.

items.name: Black Blos Shell
items.description: A shell from a Black Diablos. The dark color is popular with hunters.

items.name: Black Blos Spine
items.description: The skillfully removed spine of a Black Diablos, it is thick and dull.

items.name: Black Blos Tail
items.description: The tail of a Black Diablos, like a giant black iron hammer.

items.name: Vespoid Abdomen
items.description: The abdomen of a Vespoid queen. In rare cases these are filled with eggs.

items.name: Vespoid Shell
items.description: With special materials, this can be worked into very strong armor.

items.name: Vespoid Carapace
items.description: Hardest part of a Vespoid shell. Exhibits special properties when processed.

items.name: Vespoid Wing
items.description: A hard-to-work material.  Front and reverse sides have different textures.

items.name: Vespoid Bladefin
items.description: The knife-like wing of a Vespoid. The key to its predatory ability.

items.name: Vspoid Razorwing
items.description: Even sharper than a Bladefin, the lightest touch will cut anything.

items.name: Hornetaur Shell
items.description: With special materials, this can be worked into very strong armor.

items.name: Hornet Carapace
items.description: Hardest part of a Hornet shell. Exhibits special properties when worked.

items.name: Hornetaur Head
items.description: With special materials, can be worked into strong weapons or armor.

items.name: Hornetaur Wing
items.description: A hard-to-work material. Appears pearlescent when struck by light.

items.name: Hornet Bladefin
items.description: The knife-like wing of a Hornetaur. Key to its predatory ability.

items.name: Hornet Razorwing
items.description: Even sharper than a Bladefin, the lightest touch will cut anything.

items.name: Sm Lobstershell
items.description: The cranial shell of a King Lobster eaten by a Piscine Wyvern. Very rare.

items.name: Lg Lobstershell
items.description: The body shell of a King Lobster eaten by a Piscine Wyvern. Very rare.

items.name: Gt Lobstershell
items.description: King Lobster used as bait for a Piscine, the shell remains in its stomach.

items.name: Monoblos Coin
items.description: Coin given on the whim of a training teacher upon defeating a Monoblos.

items.name: Crimson Horn
items.description: Obtaining this Monoblos horn makes you the Hero of Kokoto.

items.name: Monoblos Shell
items.description: Shell from a Monoblos, a sub-species of Diablos. Gray-colored.

items.name: Monoblos Spine
items.description: A hard spine from the back of a Monoblos. A weaponcraft material.

items.name: Monoblos Heart
items.description: The heart of a Monoblos. Symbolizes ferocious anger.

items.name: Wht Monoblos Hrn
items.description: Unusual White Monoblos Horn. Shines like new snow. Highly desirable.

items.name: Wht Monoblos Shl
items.description: Unique White Monoblos Shell. The clean white is a popular mystery.

items.name: Wht Monoblos Spn
items.description: Unusual Wht Monoblos Spn, expertly cut away. It is a burning white.

items.name: Kirin Horn
items.description: The horn of the beast god, as powerful as a lightning bolt. Exquisite material.

items.name: Kirin Hide
items.description: Beautiful white hide. As hard to use as it is to obtain. Exquisite.

items.name: Kirin Mane
items.description: Magnificent silver mane. Even after being cut off, it seems to retain energy.

items.name: Kirin Thndr Tail
items.description: A rare tail overflowing with elegance, charged with electricity.

items.name: Kirin Azure Horn
items.description: This azure horn is a rare item even for Kirin Horns, giving off a divine light.

items.name: Kirin Azr T-Tail
items.description: Extremely rare Azure Kirin tail, crackling blue and white with electricity.

items.name: Sm Lao-Shan Claw
items.description: The claw of Lao-Shan Lung. Working it requires an experienced artisan.

items.name: Lao-Shan Claw
items.description: Lao-Shan's massive claw. Impossible to work, so it must be used as-is.

items.name: Lao-Shan Horn
items.description: Horn from Lao-Shan's snout. A prized find. Can be fused with Firestone.

items.name: Lao-Shan Scale
items.description: Deep red scale that is the equal of any wyvern's shell. Easy to work with.

items.name: Lao-Shan Scale+
items.description: Deep red scale whose hardness rivals even that of a carapace.

items.name: Lao-Shan Plate
items.description: A massive scale from Lao-Shan. Possessing it proves a hunter's worth.

items.name: Lao-Shan Ruby
items.description: A precious gem from inside a wyvern. The burning red is the gem's soul.

items.name: Lao-Shan Shell
items.description: Shell of Lao-Shan Lung. The thick dragon shell tells you of its age.

items.name: Lao-ShanCarapace
items.description: The carapace of a giant wyvern. Years ago, this carapace was a shell.

items.name: Lao-Shan Spine
items.description: The back-spine of a thousand-year-old dragon. Boasts superior hardness.

items.name: LaoShan Thoracic
items.description: The hardest part of a (DIABLOS) Lao-Shan spine. Incredibly hard to carve away.

items.name: LaoS Heavy Shell
items.description: The hardest part of Lao-Shan's shell. Very difficult to work.

items.name: Azure LaoS Claw
items.description: Claw from a mountain-like Azure Lao-Shan. It cannot be worked upon.

items.name: Azure LaoS Horn
items.description: A horn carved from an Azure Lao-Shan. A priceless treasure.

items.name: Azure LaoS Scale
items.description: A scale carved from an Azure Lao-Shan, it is much bigger than normal.

items.name: Azure LaoS Plate
items.description: Tail plate from an Azure Lao-Shan. Worth enough to change a man's fate.

items.name: Azure LaoS Shell
items.description: Shell from an enormous Azure Lao-Shan, it is as big as a piece of bedrock.

items.name: Azure LaoS Spine
items.description: Spine as large as a rocky mountain. Only one part can be used for crafting.

items.name: Fatalis' Horn
items.description: The power of the dragon is said to reside in the four horns atop his skull.

items.name: Fatalis' Spike
items.description: Tapered horn of a Fatalis. The black luster gives it a dubious charm.

items.name: Fatalis' Gore
items.description: A dangerous, sharp Fatalis horn. Only to be worked by experienced craftsmen.

items.name: Fatalis' Scale
items.description: A scale from Fatalis' body that goes on to form its shell.

items.name: Fatalis' Scale+
items.description: Jet black scale. Looks may be deceiving, as a harder glace reveals its quality.

items.name: Thck Fatalis Scl
items.description: Thick, jet black Fatalis scale. The thickness tells the story of its age.

items.name: Fatalis' Shell
items.description: A multi-layered carapace that cannot be damaged by normal weaponry.

items.name: Fatalis Carapace
items.description: Carapace that protects a Fatalis' spinal column, it is shell upon shell.

items.name: Fatalis Hvy Shl
items.description: Even harder than a Fatalis Carapace, this material is known as Mymaite.

items.name: Fatalis' Crust
items.description: Hideous crust fused with the melted remains of previous hunters' gear.

items.name: Hrd Fatalis Crst
items.description: A breastplate that has become harder with age. A source of terrible pride.

items.name: Hvy Fatalis Crst
items.description: Strange amalgamation of armor and shell. A living thing can't be this heavy!

items.name: Fatalis' Eye
items.description: The crystalline eyeball of Fatalis. One of the Three Great Treasures.

items.name: Fatalis Shrp Eye
items.description: A Fatalis eye with a piercing gaze, it glows as if it were still alive.

items.name: Fatalis Evil Eye
items.description: A Fatalis eye with a strange ambiance, as if it still had a soul within.

items.name: Fatalis' Webbing
items.description: The large surface area makes it very useful. Must be used when fresh.

items.name: Fatalis' Wing
items.description: Giant, hard wing of a Fatalis. Light and made from a strange material.

items.name: Fatalis Strg Wng
items.description: A Fatalis wing with metal like strength. Working it requires high technology.

items.name: Fatlis Crmsn Hrn
items.description: Crimson red horn of an angered Fatalis. Glows red, even if cut off.

items.name: Fatlis Crmsn Scl
items.description: Fatalis scale dyed red with hate. It flashes crimson in the darkness.

items.name: Fatlis Crmsn Shl
items.description: Fatalis shell bathed red with wrath, but the black base betrays its roots.

items.name: Ft Crmsn B-Plate
items.description: Breastplate of a Fatalis, red with anger, shining as if verging on eruption.

items.name: Fatalis Devl Eye
items.description: The eye of an angered Fatalis, its fiendish gaze is too much for some.

items.name: Fatlis Crmsn Wng
items.description: The wing of Fatalis, swirling with a magma-like crimson of anger.

items.name: Egg Ticket
items.description: Ticket obtained by giving eggs to the Guild. Try collecting them.

items.name: Jewel Ticket
items.description: Ticket obtained by giving ore to the Guild. Try collecting them.

items.name: Commendation
items.description: Ticket awarded for a display of bravery. Try collecting them.

items.name: Pawprint Stamp
items.description: Money used by beast creatures. You can't decipher the writing.

items.name: Old Lady's Note
items.description: Order note from the old lady at the food ingredient shop.

items.name: Guild Ticket
items.description: Rare ticket obtained by attending and completing a Guild-sponsored event.

items.name: Silver Ticket
items.description: Presented to those who rent rooms at the guest house for long periods of time.

items.name: Gold Ticket
items.description: Presented to those who rent Bishop rooms at the guest house for long periods of time.

items.name: Platinum Ticket
items.description: Presented to users of the guest house VIP room for an extended period of time.

items.name: BBQ Ticket
items.description: Awarded to those who truly know how to cook flavorful meat.

items.name: Hunter Citation
items.description: Awarded to top hunters by the Hero of Kokoto.

items.name: Grt Sword Ticket
items.description: Awarded for achievement in Great Sword training. Proof of strength.

items.name: Hammer Ticket
items.description: Awarded for achievement in Hammer training. Proof of strength.

items.name: Lance Ticket
items.description: Awarded for achievement in Lance training. Proof of strength.

items.name: SnS Ticket
items.description: Awarded for achievement in Sword training. Proof of strength.

items.name: Gunner Ticket
items.description: Awarded for achievement in Gunner training. Proof of strength.

items.name: Paw Pass Ticket
items.description: After I give this to you, I'm going home...*meow* (Supply Item)

items.name: Famitsu Ticket
items.description: Ticket needed to begin production of the Hunting Life special weapon.

items.name: Dengeki Ticket
items.description: Wow, thanks for participating in the event. The Dengeki game magazine is good too. -Polytan.

items.name: Dengeki G Ticket
items.description: How was the event? You should definitely come and fight me again. -Polytan

items.name: Chrome Voucher
items.description: For those about to rock. GMR salutes you. We're rocking right along.

items.name: Lost Umbrella
items.description: Noblewoman's umbrella. Seems to have hidden features. Try fixing it.

items.name: Chief's Old Sword
items.description: Village Chief's sword from his hunting days. Rumored to be part of a set.

items.name: Ruststone
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ruststone (bowgun)
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ruststone (great sword)
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ruststone (hammer)
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ruststone (sword and shield)
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ruststone (lance)
items.description: Looks like a lump of dirt, but it's actually rusted metal. Try polishing it...

items.name: Ancient Stone
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Ancient Stone (bowgun)
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Ancient Stone (great sword)
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Ancient Stone (hammer)
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Ancient Stone (dual swords)
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Ancient Stone (lance)
items.description: Appears to be some kind of fossilized metal. Maybe a treasure if polished.

items.name: Organizer Guide
items.description: Issue of popular "Hunting Life" magazine that has an article on item box usage.

items.name: Backpacker Guide
items.description: Issue of popular "Hunting Life" magazine that has an article on carrying items.

items.description: Reference material for your Monster List. Habits, ecology, etc.

items.name: Silver Egg
items.description: A glittering Silver Egg. Incredibly expensive and rare. No use to a hunter.

items.name: Golden Egg
items.description: A glittering Gold Egg. Incredibly expensive and rare. No use to a hunter.

items.name: Map
items.description: A map that shows the topography of the region. (Supply Item)

items.name: First-aid Med.
items.description: Medicine that restores a small amount of Health. (Supply Item)

items.name: Ration
items.description: Restores a small amount of Stamina if eaten. (Supply Item)

items.name: Portable Spit
items.description: A Guild BBQ spit for novice hunters. (Supply Item)

items.name: Mini Whetstone
items.description: A small whetstone for restoring Sharpness. (Supply Item)

items.name: Tranq Bomb
items.description: Use to subdue and capture a trapped monster. (Supply Item)

items.name: Ballista S
items.description: Ammunition for a very large Bowgun installation. (Supply Item)

items.name: Cannon S
items.description: Special ammo used against large dragons. Very heavy. (Supply Item)

items.name: Wyvern
items.description: No explanation necessary.

items.name: Wyvern Egg
items.description: An egg stolen from a wyvern's nest.

items.name: Herbivore Egg
items.description: An egg stolen from an Apceros nest. Said to be delicious.

items.name: Sootstone Ore
items.description: Ore that contains Sootstone.

items.name: Quartz Ore
items.description: Ore that contains White Quartz.

items.name: Powderstone
items.description: Rock that explodes upon even the slightest impact. Be careful!
